### Summary of Problem

(Please answer all 3)

- What are you trying to do?
- What happens?
- What should have happened?

### Code to Reproduce the Issue

```js
const serialport = new SerialPort(path)

// Code
```

### Versions, Operating System and Hardware

- SerialPort@?
- Node.js v?
- Windows? Linux? Mac?
- Hardware and chipset? (Prolific/FTDI/Other)
